Module ParenteVenturini
Package it.polimi.ingsw.ParenteVenturini.Network.Server

Class GameDispatcher

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ParenteVenturini.Network.Server.GameDispatcher
public class GameDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
Singleton class that handle the creation of new games, keeping track of active games

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController​(java.lang.String nickname, int numOfPlayers) throws InvalidNicknameException
      create of get the available game controller
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who requests the gameController
      numOfPlayers - the number of players the match must be, if the gameController hasn't been initialized yet
      Returns:
      the gameController
      Throws:
      InvalidNicknameException - thrown if the nickname is not valid

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame​(GameController gc)
      remove the gameController when a match ends
      Parameters:
      gc - the game controller that must be removed
